${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Collateral.NAME: Collateral
${modID}:Collateral.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Draw !M! Card.

${modID}:Shank.NAME: Shank
${modID}:Shank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
${modID}:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! energy. NL Add a Burn into your discard pile.

${modID}:RigtheDeck.NAME: Rig the Deck
${modID}:RigtheDeck.DESCRIPTION: Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
${modID}:RigtheDeck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place a card from your discard pile in your hand.

${modID}:FrontierJustice.NAME: Frontier Justice
${modID}:FrontierJustice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy gain [E] [E] [E].

${modID}:QuickStrike.NAME: Quick Strike
${modID}:QuickStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:Desperado.NAME: Desperado
${modID}:Desperado.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.
${modID}:Desperado.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card into your discard pile. NL Retain.

${modID}:CoverUp.NAME: Cover Up
${modID}:CoverUp.DESCRIPTION: If you have no Block, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:FirstMove.NAME: First Move
${modID}:FirstMove.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Focus. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Focus.

${modID}:Intimidate.NAME: Intimidate
${modID}:Intimidate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ReflexFire.NAME: Reflex Fire
${modID}:ReflexFire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${modID}:Deadweight.NAME: Deadweight
${modID}:Deadweight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain [E] [E].
${modID}:Deadweight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain [E] [E] [E].

${modID}:ItsHighNoon.NAME: It's High Noon
${modID}:ItsHighNoon.DESCRIPTION: Load !M! shot for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ItsHighNoon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Load !M! shot for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Rebuttal.NAME: Rebuttal
${modID}:Rebuttal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, Load !M! Bullet.

${modID}:MustacheSnacks.NAME: Mustache Snacks
${modID}:MustacheSnacks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Next turn, NL gain [G].
${modID}:MustacheSnacks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Next turn, NL gain [G] [G].
